prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Piano, Bass, Guitar, Drums, but without Organ.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Piano, Bass, Guitar, and Drums, but no Organ.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Piano, Bass, Guitar, and Drums, but excludes Organ.

Style 3:
This composition is Piano, Bass, Guitar, and Drums, Organ not included.
